title: Trustmark Corporation to Announce Third Quarter Financial Results October 27 and Conduct Earnings Conference Call October 28 (Businesswire)
content:
2015-09-29 23:00 
 

                Trustmark Corporation to Announce Third Quarter Financial Results October 27 and Conduct Earnings Conference Call October 28  
Trustmark Corporation (NASDAQ:TRMK) will announce its third quarter 2015 
      financial results in a news release on Tuesday, October 27, after close 
      of the market. Gerard R. Host, President and Chief Executive Officer, 
      will conduct a conference call with analysts on Wednesday, October 28 at 
      10:00 a.m. Central Time to discuss the Corporation’s financial results. 
      Interested parties may listen to the conference call by dialing (877) 
      317-3051 or by clicking on the link provided under the Investor 
      Relations section of our website at www.trustmark.com . 
      A replay of the conference call will also be available through 
      Wednesday, November 11, 2015, in archived format at the same web address 
      or by calling (877) 344-7529, passcode 10072410. 
 
Trustmark is a financial services company providing banking and 
      financial solutions through 200 offices in Alabama, Florida, 
      Mississippi, Tennessee and Texas. 
 


View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150929006827/en/
